meta.content: We are fundraising for those affected by the Covid-19 crisis This moment is a testament to the human spirit and iLearn Schools stands ready to help any way we can!In response to the COVID-19 crisis, iLearn Schools has committed to support its families and the community overcome their struggles through its iCare initiative.The statewide shutdown due to COVID-19 has left many families without any means of getting their next meal and provide for their everyday expense. On top of this huge food insecurity challenge, most of them are also experiencing anxiety, stress and isolation. Now more than ever, we need to come together to support our most vulnerable community members. 100% of your contribution will directly impact those who need them the most!Here's how your donation can help:Living Expense Hourly workers, people without paid sick time and laid-off workers are among the most vulnerable to the negative financial effects of the pandemic. With no way to cover expenses, they will inevitably fall behind on rent and other fixed expenses. With your contribution, we can help supplement some of these gaps and ease their burden.Food, Water and other Basic NecessitiesFamilies who have tested positive for Covid-19 or are high-risk for severe illness caused by the virus or are essential workers are finding it hard to have access to these necessities because they are unable to go out. Most especially, households that are already strained in good times will find that this crisis is another threat to overcome. Through this effort, we are ensuring that the children are provided for and that their social and emotional well-being are taken care of. At iLearn Schools, we believe that no matter the challenge in front of us, we can conquer it together through our caring and continued commitment to learning and growing in the face of adversity.We thank you for your generosity and thoughtfulness!DONATE HERE

div.class: elementor-element elementor-element-666d669 elementor-widget elementor-widget-theme-post-title elementor-page-title elementor-widget-heading

div.h3: We are fundraising for those affected by the Covid-19 crisis

span.span: This moment is a testament to the human spirit and iLearn Schools stands ready to help any way we can!

div.p: In response to the COVID-19 crisis, iLearn Schools has committed to support its families and the community overcome their struggles through its iCare initiative.

The statewide shutdown due to COVID-19 has left many families without any means of getting their next meal and provide for their everyday expense. On top of this huge food insecurity challenge, most of them are also experiencing anxiety, stress and isolation. Now more than ever, we need to come together to support our most vulnerable community members.

strong.i: 100% of your contribution will directly impact those who need them the most!

strong.em: Here's how your donation can help:

div.p: Hourly workers, people without paid sick time and laid-off workers are among the most vulnerable to the negative financial effects of the pandemic. With no way to cover expenses, they will inevitably fall behind on rent and other fixed expenses. With your contribution, we can help supplement some of these gaps and ease their burden.

i.span: Food, Water and other Basic Necessities

div.p: Families who have tested positive for Covid-19 or are high-risk for severe illness caused by the virus or are essential workers are finding it hard to have access to these necessities because they are unable to go out. Most especially, households that are already strained in good times will find that this crisis is another threat to overcome. Through this effort, we are ensuring that the children are provided for and that their social and emotional well-being are taken care of.
At iLearn Schools, we believe that no matter the challenge in front of us, we can conquer it together through our caring and continued commitment to learning and growing in the face of adversity.
We thank you for your generosity and thoughtfulness!

article.class: elementor-post elementor-grid-item post-23074 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-bergen-ascs category-news

h3.a: iLearn Schools Announces Union ASCS Location!

div.p: We are proud to announce that Union Arts and Science Charter School building will be located at 705 Clinton Street, Linden, NJ 07036. School starts in September

div.p: The application process for the following school year starts by September of the current year. iLearn Schools does not discriminate in its admission policies or practices on the basis of intellectual or athletic ability, measures of achievement or aptitude, status as a handicapped person, proficiency in the English language or any other basis that would be illegal if used by a district board of education.
